patterns: library location to university main gate
responses: Central Library is near the Science Block, about 1.2 km  from the main gate .
Academic Block is at the center of the campus, opposite to the Library.
Academic Block is at the center of the campus, opposite to the Library.
Academic Block is at the center of the campus, opposite to the Library.
Academic Block is at the center of the campus, opposite to the Library.
The canteen is located behind the Admin Block, approx. 250 meters from the Library.

patterns: Vice Chancellor ka office kidhar hai
responses: The VC Office is inside the Administrative Block, around 500 meters from the Academic Block.

patterns: examination hall ki location kya hai?
responses: The Admin Block is near the main entrance of the campus, opposite to the canteen.
The hostels are located on the north side of the campus, near the sports complex.
The hostels are located on the north side of the campus, near the sports complex.
The Exam Cell is situated in the Admin Block, next to the Admission Office.

patterns: guest ke rhne ke liye koi jagh  hai
responses: The sports ground is on the west side of the campus, close to the hostel.

patterns: secrecy building ka kya kaam hai?
exam se related secrecy block ka role?
responses: Secrecy Block exam-related confidential work ke liye hota hai like question paper banana, answer sheets security, and result processingà¥¤

DSW (Dean Student Welfare) Block student-related cultural, sports, aur welfare activities ko handle karta hai.
Yeh block students ke NSS, events, helpdesk aur samasyaon ka samadhan karta hai.

patterns: research building ka kya kaam hai?
PhD ka research block kahan padta hai?
responses: Research Block me PhD aur MPhil students ke liye sabhi research-related kaam hote hain.
Yeh block Academic Block 4 ke paas sthit hai aur research faculty ka main office bhi yahin hota hai.
